CustomField.formula: IF(Modified_Contract_Start_Date__c = DATE((YEAR(TODAY())-1),07,01) , 364, IF(End_of_CFY__c - Modified_Contract_Start_Date__c < 0 , 0, IF(End_of_CFY__c - Modified_Contract_Start_Date__c < 365 , End_of_CFY__c - Modified_Contract_Start_Date__c, 0)))
CustomField.label: EFY Days Remaining
